on reading compounds: 拈華微笑【ネンゲミショウ】heart-to-heart communication, thought transference, holding a flower and subtly smiling
捻出【ネンシュツ】contriving (to raise funds, to find time, etc.), working out (a solution)
kun reading compounds: 捻る【ひねる】to twist, to wrench, to turn (a switch on or off, etc.), to wring (a neck), to puzzle over, to defeat easily
